content.description: The nation of Turboland produces only two goods, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. The prices and final quantities produced of the two goods in 1993 and the base year of 1992 are shown in the table below.
content.question: Price of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ($) Quantity of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> (units) Price of Good <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> ($) Quantity of Good <math alttext="Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Y</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> (units) 1992 (base year) 5 4 10 5 1993 6 6 10 6 What are the nominal <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in 1993?

choices.label: Nominal <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> is $90, Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> is $96
